code: import axios from'axios';console.log('API BASE URL:',process.env.REACT_APP_API_BASE_URL);const BASE_URL=process.env.REACT_APP_API_BASE_URL;class MovieDataService{getAll(){let page=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:0;return axios.get("".concat(BASE_URL,"/api/v1/movies?page=").concat(page));}find(query){let by=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:'title';let page=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:0;return axios.get("".concat(BASE_URL,"/api/v1/movies?").concat(by,"=").concat(query,"&page=").concat(page));}getRatings(){return axios.get("".concat(BASE_URL,"/api/v1/movies/ratings"));}get(id){return axios.get("".concat(BASE_URL,"/api/v1/movies/id/").concat(id));}createReview(data){return axios.post("".concat(BASE_URL,"/api/v1/movies/review"),data);}updateReview(data){return axios.put("".concat(BASE_URL,"/api/v1/movies/review"),data);}deleteReview(data){return axios.delete("".concat(BASE_URL,"/api/v1/movies/review"),{data});}}/* eslint import/no-anonymous-default-export: [2, {"allowNew": true}] */export default new MovieDataService();
